Articles.Content:
![rm1KcQ4.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/rm1KcQ4.jpg)
![N7Vevb0.jpg?1](http://i.imgur.com/N7Vevb0.jpg?1)

My first build of an F-15 Eagle. I went with the real life J variant which is a Japanese single pilot version of the craft. There is no benefit to having two pilots in Kerbal combat, so I decided on this one for the sake of performance.

The video is pretty great. Filming quality is good, and fun combat.

![DistantKeyAtlanticsharpnosepuffer.gif](http://giant.gfycat.com/DistantKeyAtlanticsharpnosepuffer.gif)

![20469202265_b5f5625009_b.jpg](https://farm1.staticflickr.com/441/20469202265_b5f5625009_b.jpg)

![20442965096_90f9554cb0_b.jpg](https://farm1.staticflickr.com/484/20442965096_90f9554cb0_b.jpg)

![urnYBtM.png](http://i.imgur.com/urnYBtM.png)

![ME2Efne.png](http://i.imgur.com/ME2Efne.png)

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/L4Q00XfsLC8?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

<iframe width="640" height="480" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen=""></iframe>

[\[cb_co\] F-15j Eagle Model](https://sketchfab.com/models/804421cf873a437d89cc0adb00c582c9) by [clown_baby](https://sketchfab.com/clown_baby) on [Sketchfab](https://sketchfab.com)

**Armed Eagle**

Parts: 134

Weight: 14.3t

Length: 13.2m

Wingspan: 10.2m

Top Speed at 100m: 338.2

Top Speed at 10,000m: 794.2m/s

Acceleration: 32.92 m/s^2

**Stock Eagle**

Parts: 110

Weight: 12.6t

Length: 13.2m

Wingspan: 10.2m

Top Speed at 100m: 349.3

Top Speed at 10,000m: 

Acceleration: 45.22 m/s^2

The craft is quick an performs well, capable of supercruise with adjustments, and has a large weapons payload. Maybe in the future I'll add in the second cockpit. But for now I'm super happy with this.

Thanks for checking it out. Critiques always appreciated.

cb.

**Flying tips:**

-At higher altitudes and lower speeds, enable pitch on the main wing's outer flap.

**Action Keys:**

1) Toggle both engines

2) Toggle starboard engine

3) Toggle port engine

4) Toggle autopilot

5) Arm/Toggle Guard Mode

7) Switch team

8) Fire Sidewinder x2

9) Fire Sidewinder x2

0) Flairs

**Downloads:**

[F-15j Armed Eagle](http://www./download/yuuvxbue4zatfw4/%5Bcb_co%5D_F-15j_Armed_Eagle.craft) (Please use BDArmorys 8.3 until the bugs are worked out on the upgrade. If you have upgraded. Use alt-b and toggle legacy targeting)

http://www./download/58jmicso7egqqs3/%5Bcb_co%5D_F-15j_Eagle.craft

F-15j Eagle Stock

**Edited <time datetime="2015-08-11T23:51:52Z" title="08/11/2015 11:51  PM" data-short="8 yr">August 11, 2015</time> by clown\_baby**
Nice, I like how you made the fuselage

> 
> Nice, I like how you made the fuselage

Thanks dude. The top is flat so it was pretty easy, but on the bottom I really wanted to replicate how the intakes move inwards as they go towards the engines. With the deep well between them, for the extra fuel tank.

![hly2YrT.png](http://imgur.com/hly2YrT.png)

I think I turned out well, I appreciate the comment.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-08-12T15:22:07Z" title="08/12/2015 03:22  PM" data-short="8 yr">August 12, 2015</time> by clown\_baby**

My favorite fighter of all time and I never knew the J was licensed to be manufactured by Mitsubishi. A little ashamed of myself haha. Killer craft dude! Was trying to make my own but the dimensions were killing me. Your attention to detail is superb. Now I'm gunna steal it and upgrade it with some mods ![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif)
Nice work. I've been tinkering with my own - trying to build it with a custom cockpit. But so far it's not right...
